entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F87B,85,3,1,1}{F813,0,207009}Don't rush me, goody-two-shoes.{F801}There's an order to everything.{F801}

We need weapons{F801}if we want to take him out.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,207012}Northwest of here, there's a town{F801}called Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}{F87B,85,12,1,1}{F813,0,207013}I plan to defeat the guys in charge{F801}there and take the town.{F801}
